description: Muscular Cam and chiseled Josh are taking a stroll along the beach as they head towards the house for some fun one-on-one time. “We’re ready to have some fun. I’m excited to see that ass that I heard is so beautiful,” says Josh as he cops a feel of that booty. There’s nothing left to do or say as they make their way to satisfying their horny cravings.
title: Josh & Cam
